## ErrorBoundary class

A React Error Boundary that captures runtime errors in its child components and reports them to Datadog RUM, rendering the `fallback` component when an error occurs.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class ErrorBoundary extends React.Component<Props, State> 
```
**Extends:** React.Component&lt;Props, State&gt;
